name: Onyx
long_description:
Onyx is the open source generative AI platform connected to your companyâ€™s docs, apps, and people. We ingest and sync from all sources of information (Google Drive, Slack, GitHub, Confluence, Salesforce, etc.) to provide a centralized place for users to ask about anything. Imagine your most knowledgeable co-workers, all-rolled into one, and available 24/7!

Check us out on Github: https://www.github.com/onyx-dot-app/onyx
Or visit our website: https://www.onyx.app/
one_liner: Open Source AI Assistant and Enterprise Search
